sceneBreakdown.title: Scene 1
sceneBreakdown.summary: Tempered Accord Custodial Council seized the Auric Steppe Corridor from the Prismwell Kite Guild amid a sudden tactical surge.

sceneBreakdown.title: Scene 2
sceneBreakdown.summary: Prismwell Kite Guild lost their hold on the Auric Steppe, retreating toward the Sable Crescent Basin.

sceneBreakdown.title: Scene 3
sceneBreakdown.summary: Echo Ledger Conclave activates the Spectrum Bloom Flux Array, a critical prohibited capability that threatens the Kyther Range.

sceneBreakdown.title: Scene 4
sceneBreakdown.summary: Sable Crescent Basin is under serious threat while the Custodial Council stabilised the Kyther Range Vault.

actSummary.title: Act 1
actSummary.summary: Tempered Accord Custodial Council seized the Auric Steppe Corridor from the Prismwell Kite Guild amid a sudden tactical surge. Prismwell Kite Guild lost their hold on the Auric Steppe, retreating toward the Sable Crescent Basin. Echo Ledger Conclave activates the Spectrum Bloom Flux Array, a critical prohibited capability that threatens the Kyther Range. Sable Crescent Basin is under serious threat while the Custodial Council stabilised the Kyther Range Vault.

capabilityRefs.label: Spectrum Bloom Flux Array
capabilityRefs.rationale: Legendary device claims simultaneous resonance across every band. Violates Resonance Charter safeguards noted in WORLD_BIBLE.md (Technology · Spectrum Bloom Flux Array).

### Prismwell Kite Guild

### Kyther Range Vault
- lore bundle updated
- status shifts to threatened

### Spectrum Bloom Flux Array
- lore bundle updated

### Sable Crescent Basin
- status shifts to threatened
